title: Davis Apartment For Rent Unit 201
posting_body: Enjoy the convenience of onsite parking, laundry and storage at Davis Apartments.
Our large one bedrooms have enough space for you to live and relax.
The building has controlled access, you cannot get in without a key or be buzzed in through the intercom system.
We have a coin operated laundry room in building as well.
Heat and Water included in rent.
Unit comes with a stove and a fridge.
Each unit is cat friendly; with a $300 one time pet fee.
We do not require a security deposit.
It will be a $35 application fee (+15 for a second person) and a $300 one time non-refundable administration fee.
Please note: Calls for apartments will only be answered between 9am and 8pm.
Call to set up a tour!
